name: Cellhut

overview:
CellHut carries a huge variety of International Unlocked GSM dual-band, tri-band and quad-band phones that can be used worldwide with different GSM carriers/operators. In addition to offering unlocked phones, we also carry a complete line of genuine accessories for most wireless & cellular phones. We stock all of our products in-house and directly ship them to our customers, which mean that you receive your order promptly.

CellHut is dedicated to offering the latest wireless products â€“ unlocked cell phone, bluetooths and accessories at the best prices. We pride ourselves in offering sophisticated service and efficient ordering to make our customers’ ordering process a breeze.

We ensure secure data transfer to protect customer’s data. Our online transaction system has been certified by Network Solutions $1 million guarantee. We will never share any of you confidential information with any third party. CellHut emphasizes customer service in every aspect of the business in order to ensure a speedy delivery and satisfied purchasing experience.
